resources.string: A tool to watch the kickstarter projects you have backed. Also helps you to keep an eye on bookmarked project.s

Every Kickstarter user has a so called vanity url that directs to his/her profile. When you go to your profile on Kickstarter and take a look at the address bar of your browser, you should see a linke ending with \"…/profile/[yourusername]\", where the value in brackets represents your username (or userid). Use this very value here and you can navigate your backed projects from the \"My Backed Projects\" view.
